items.text: right forward as he defends
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hetmyer, no run

items.text: floated full on leg stump, defended.
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hetmyer, no run

items.text: eased wide of cover point
items.postText: I'm off for a short break, peeps. Akshay is back for a fresh stint by the end of which we will know which way this game is headed. First win on tour for Bangladesh? Those in Dhaka have a good reason to stay up

items.preText:
Thanks, Shashank. All of a sudden, 280 seeming like 320. That's the thing with slow pitches. But then West Indies still have eight wickets and plenty of batting, so game on in Guyana.

MahneelMusa: "Oh dont worry a sizeable portion of Dhaka will be staying up. Working day tomorrow but who cares? Cricket prevails!" True spirit!
items.text: opens the face late to a length ball and cuts to backward point
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Hetmyer, no run

items.text: pitched up on middle, driven towards mid-on
stays back to a length ball and defends to the left of the bowler
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Gayle, no run

items.text: rooted to the crease as he punches to cover
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Gayle, no run

items.text: pushed into the offside
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Gayle, no run

items.text: taps it to cover for a sharp single
short of a length on middle and off, taps in front of mid-on for a quick single
full outside off, opens the face to deep point
back of a length outside off, opens the face to point

items.preText: "Regardless of the outcome of today's match, the way Bangladesh has approached the game has shown the reason why BD is #7 and Windies #9," reckons Zeeshan Mahmud
items.text: taps to cover point for a quick single
slower length ball that stops on him, taps it through cover awkwardly for one
length on middle, tucked to midwicket

items.text: stays back and punches down the ground for one
pushes away from the body and gets an edge through to third man, the fielder runs back and slides in front to pull it back
gets down to sweep a length ball and inside-edges to the pad
